title: Model Rockets
description: Three . . . two . . . one . . . liftoff! Building model rockets has been a hobby since the 1950s. Model Rockets provides details about the parts of a model rocket and how to launch one in the air. The photographs and diagrams illustrate this enjoyable hobby and the competitions that go along with it.
highFrequencyWords: competitions, controller, designs, engine, fuel, hobby, launchpad, model, parachute
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Exclamation Marks                : Identify and use exclamation marks
phonics: Syllable Patterns                : Recognize and understand syllable patterns
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
